Author: paranoidandpanicked
Text: I’m in this situation right now. I’m trying to balance it out by being a gym rat but now I’m obsessing over calories in vs out. I’m also trying to eat by volume to stop from binging. So I’ll eat ridiculous amount of low calorie food so I’m stuffed like a bunch of cabbage, carrots, tomatoes, watermelon, cucumbers. I know this isn’t the best advice but it’s helped me stop b/p for about a week now.

Author: cupcakelimao
Text: Yes. Trying to lose weight in a healthy manner has always been my trigger, since I was 17, I totally feel you.  I'm a perfectionist control freak, this is the deal.
